body:
> That shouldn't be a problem after Go 1.5 is released, right?

True.

> Could gomobile just recommand the binary release distributions?

Could you extend your proposal here? I don't truly understand what's your suggestion but gomobile requires 1.5 to be built and run. So, it can't tell anything to the user if user doesn't have 1.5 already.

> Or gomobile could download and build tip by its own if the current Go version is not sufficient

It would require us shipping binaries for each host platform. Much work and it will be useless once 1.5 is released.
